p: The evaluation model of fatty acids in this study mainly focuses on the evaluation of nutritional quality of fatty acids, but in daily consumption, consumers may also consider other factors, such as flavor and taste. For example, sesame oil, in China, is a type of seasoning oil, which is often used in all kinds of salad mix. Therefore, in this study, even the consumption of sesame oil is small, we also take this in consideration in our research.
